revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DI-707Pa.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 7-Ports Broadband Router Plus Print Server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.ru/mn/products/5/129.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DI-707P_rev_B1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Incompatible |openwrtsupport = Incompatible |tomatosupport = Incompatible |gargoylesupport = Incompatible
|brand = D-Link |model = DI-707P |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = B1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router, print server |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 10340A6Y1 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = AMIT;AMITSOC-0261; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 143<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = AMIC;A29002TL-70; |flash1size = 256 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = DRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 |ram1chip = GLT;GLT5160L16-7TC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = ADMtek;ADM6999; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 7 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Parallel Port (DB-25) |exp_parallel = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |manuf = AMIT |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2003 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Note: Similar to the '''DI-704P''' model, with 3 more LAN ports. {{See also|SMC SMC7004AWBR v1|AMIT|D-Link}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/d-link-di-707p-7-port-broadband-router-with-a-built-89 ''D-Link DI-707P'' Spec. on '''SpeedGuide''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Firmware=== *DI-604/704P/707P Firmware Release - Note Firmware: [http://www.dlinktw.com.tw/temp/dk2Support_Firmware/167/release_notes.pdf v3.11] :Hardware: Dx/Fx for DI-604 and Cx/Dx for DI-704P/DI-707P :Support DL7150/DL7300 CPU, Switch chip DL1005/IP175C :[[ADMtek]] ([[Infineon]]) ADM6999 - 8-ports FE (10/100) switch
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:D-Link DI-707P rev B1 board top.jpg|board top </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :;[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_models&manufacturer_id=3 D-Link Models] *[[D-Link DI-604]] (UP) *[[D-Link DI-604 rev D1]]/D2 • [http://www.szetszedtem.hu/342dlink-604/router.htm PCB images] *[[D-Link DI-604 rev F1]]/F4 *[[D-Link DI-704UP]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=161 WP] *[[D-Link DI-713P rev A1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+ rev B1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=34 WP] *[[D-Link DI-724P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=162 WP]
====Models==== *[[D-Link DI-704P rev B]] (B1/B2/B3) • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html Hardware] :CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261 (@143MHz) :Flash: 256KB Flash (''SK hynix'' HY9F002TC-70) :RAM: 2MB DRAM (''GLT'' GLT5160L16-7TC) :LAN: 5-port switch (''Atan Technology'' AT8985P) :Printer port, no JTAG, unfinished serial *[[D-Link DI-704P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=30 WP] *[[D-Link DI-707P rev B1]] (B1/B2/B3) • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/index.html Hardware] :CPU: [[AMIT]] AMITSOC-0261 (@143MHz) :Flash: 256KB Flash (''AMIC'' A29002TL-70) :RAM: 2MB DRAM (''GLT'' GLT5160L16-7TC) :LAN: 7-port switch (''[[ADMtek]]/[[Infineon]]'' ADM6999) *[[D-Link DI-707P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=31 WP]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
